thumb.description: "These things I want to tell you , The things I want to reach you, May they converge together And reach out to you." Heyyyy everyone, it's me again, Starry~ Today is my birthday, so I wanted to post an odottemita classic this year with meaningful lyrics and a powerful choreography! This one was somehow pretty difficult for me to learn, so I really hope you enjoy it! ^-^I feel like this song really resonates with a lot of us, far and wide--and I hope my cover reaches your heart and brings a smile to your face, wherever you are~ That's all for now! Stay strong and shine bright out there, everyone! StarryChoreography reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N0DZ6MrB1r0 Music reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PqJNc9KVIZEâ˜…~Where to find me~â˜… Twitter: https://twitter.com/starrylights13 Instagram: @starrylights13 - https://www.instagram.com/starrylights13I do not own the rights to this song. I do this for fun--no infringement is intended.
